testcase.name: Verify Login With valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home page..................................................passed When user clicks on signin link.............................................passed Then Next page is displayed with title......................................passed When user enters user name and password clicks on Submit button.............passed Then check user and displays login successful...............................passed When user logs out application should close.................................passed But home page should be there...............................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Login With invalid data
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home page..................................................passed When user clicks on signin link.............................................passed Then Next page is displayed with title......................................passed When user enters invalid user name or invalid password click on Submit button.passed Then check Error message is displayed.......................................passed
